page.title: 08CULMSTOCK ALLOTMENT TRUST
page.content:
Controlled by the Charity Commissioners, is CULMSTOCK ALLOTMENT TRUST with two Trustees appointed by the Parish Council and three co-opted.
Originally, allotments of 1/4 acre and smaller, and a few 'Larger Allotments' of 1,2 and 3 acres, and let to 'Industrious Cottagers', all the fields are now let to farmers. Income is used to give coal and electricity stamps to elderly parishioners, books to students and similar help to people in the Parish. For example, one year a blind girl was given a holiday and each case is given careful consideration by the Trustees.
